title: League keeps crashing!
body:
So i join the game and get all the way through to champion select. When it gets to the actual game loading screen, instead of going there the screen blacks out for a second then bugsplats. Whenever I try to reconnect, it just keeps bugsplatting. Happens in all game modes including custom games. 

I haven't been able fix it by uninstalling or running as administrator. I'm admittedly not good at fixing computer things. Any help would be appreciated.

If it matters, it was working like... last Friday.

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Bugsplats like this can be due to outdated drivers, bad game files, or even a hardware problem.  I suggest going through each troubleshooting step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for a resolution.  Have no tears, this should get you fixed up!  {{item:2003}}

So it still isnt working after trying most things that didnt confuse me. I have a picture of the [buglspat ](http://i.imgur.com/NSJRrPA.png)itself.

Any help?
It's important to try each step to get this issue resolved and rule out any possibilities.  Was there a step in particular that you had questions on completing?  Let me know!
Nothing worked so I submitted a ticket. Thank you!
